title: Virtual Assistant for Lead Generation + Podcast Pitching
job_overview:
About Us

We’re Biohack The Fat, a fast-growing health and weight loss company helping men and women over 40 lose 30–50 lbs, reverse metabolic issues, and reclaim their energy — without drugs, starvation, or gimmicks.

We’re on a mission to change lives, and we need a Rockstar VA to help get this system in front of more people — through LinkedIn outreach, podcast pitching, and lead generation.

Role Overview

We’re hiring a Virtual Assistant to support with:

- Searching and messaging potential podcast hosts to pitch our founder
- Researching and connecting with potential licensee candidates (health coaches, nutritionists, fitness pros)
- Sending and managing DM outreach on LinkedIn
- Creating basic tracking spreadsheets and organizing communication
- Helping manage leads and follow-up inside our CRM (Go High Level)

Skills & Qualifications

To succeed in this role, you’ll need:

1) Strong written English and communication skills
2) Experience with LinkedIn and/or podcast pitching (or ability to learn quickly)
3) High attention to detail and ability to follow SOPs
4) Reliable internet and ability to work independently

BONUS: Experience with Go High Level or lead generation

Hours & Pay

Starting at 10–12 hours/week

- Flexible schedule (we just need consistency)
- Room to grow into a full-time position
- Starting rate: $3–$5/hour USD (based on experience)

How to Apply

If you're excited to be part of something meaningful and want to grow with a mission-driven team — we’d love to hear from you!

1) Why you’re a great fit for this role
2) Your experience with outreach, lead generation, or LinkedIn
3) One fun fact about yourself ????

Looking forward to connecting with you!

Trevor Folgering
Founder, Biohack The Fat
